sourcesContent:
POST NEW EMPLOYEE DATA

Employee Number is required.
Employee Number must be at least 5 characters.
Employee Number cannot be more than 10 characters.
Employee name is required.
Employee name must be at least 5 characters.
Employee name cannot be more than 50 characters.
Mobile is required.
Mobile must be exactly 10 characters.
Mobile must be exactly 10 characters.
Email is required.
Invalid email format.
Mobile must be exactly 10 characters.
